title: Taken by the Nerd
description: Nora has always been hopeless when it comes to computers.When her wireless internet starts to go haywire, Nora calls the local compu-nerd shop to help her out. What Nora doesn’t expect is to fall straight into the arms of Matt -- the world’s hottest computer nerd.Nora just wants her internet back, but Matt has other ideas. And things are about to get steamy. . .At 3000 words, Taken by the Nerd is steaming hot erotica containing rough sex and watersports.
author: Zara Slade
